mapper.select: SELECT /* UMAFtpUploadMapper.selectUploadFileList */ PUBC_SEQ , FILE_SEQ , 0 FILE_ORD , (SELECT ORGN_FILE_NM FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.FILE_SEQ) AS ORGN_FILE_NM , (SELECT WEB_PATH FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.FILE_SEQ) AS WEB_PATH , (SELECT PHY_PATH FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.FILE_SEQ) AS PHY_PATH , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) REG_NAME , REG_ID , REG_IP , REG_DTM FROM SM_FILE_PUBC_MST A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
